message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a great deal for its value. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the value of the item, I'm willing to come down to $170. This feels like a fair compromise. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $170 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
